content: So I've created a new label for Polonius issues: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3ANLL-polonius, and I've removed NLL-deferred labels from issues that also have an NLL-diagnostics or NLL-performance label (since any issue with one of those labels is already lower priority).
The remaining issues marked NLL-deferred are mostly soundness, completeness or implementation issues.
